root.name: pop'n music 3
root.description: Pop'n Music 3 was the first game in the series to be released only as an append disc. CS version song list(Numbers represent difficulty level for Normal / Hyper ) Arcade Version Songs MAGICAL GIRL / 恋のシャレード / パーキッツ (Megumi) - 9 / -GUITAR POP / Take Me To... / Sana (Rie chan) - 10 / -CELT / 水中家族のテーマ / パーキッツ (Poet) - 11 / -KANGTONG / 和一起走 / Cathy Lau (LingLing) - 12 / -MONDO / Little Robin's Drawer / Uncle Motchee (Cyber) - 13 / -J-RB2 / 愛を探そう / Ma-You (Tourmaline) - 13 / -HEARTFUL / peppermint / 浅井裕子プロジェクト (Candy) - 14 / - DANCE POP / Till the end of time / Jullianne Edison (Rave Girl) - 16 / -NEW COMER / un-Balance / 佐藤千晶 (Kate) - 18 / -SOUNDTRACK / 宇宙船Q-Mex / Q-Mex (P1P2) - 21 / -POWERFOLK / なんか変だ / 新堂敦士 (Ash) - 23 / - CS Original SongsROCKABILLY / シャバダ！ de ジルバ！ / Chako (Jennifer) - 12 / -DREAMY / penguin / NAKATEK (Boy) - 14 / -JAZZY / Get on that train / Q-Mex (Charlie) - 16 / -CLASSIC 3 / Dynamics / Waldeus von dovjak (Harmanov) - 17 / HSUPER POP / 僕たちの計画 / スーパースランプ (Captain Super Pop) - 19 / - Hidden SongsLOVELY / 8月のサヨナラ / Sana (SANAE Chan) - 15 / -JUNGLE / LA LA LA / edison (Bamboo?) - 23 / -PRELUDE / Streams / Waldeus von dovjak (Edward) - 20 / HBOYS / 君を抱きしめたい！ / 微熱★kids (三浦ヒカル) - 21 / -POSITIVE / Candy Blue / 浅井裕子 (Sunny) - 22 / - Preview SongGROOVE ROCK / 赤いリンゴ / Lollipop Tonic featuring K (Aya) - 15 / - Returning SongsCUTE / 取り返してやる！～Again,My Lovely Day～ / Akko's (Anzu) - 5 / HLIVE / Theme of staff roll ～special mix～ / きまぐれポッパーズ (Poppers) - 11 / -AKIBA / E.C.M. / PAPEHINA meets Haya-P (Shorky) - 12 / -J-RB / Sayonara / ANNA (Tourmaline) - 13 / -LOUNGE / Cherry Raquel / The Ebisu Singers (Reo Kun) - 14 / -NEW FOLK / 走れブン！ブン！ / わがまま7 (Flower) - 15 / -J-GARAGE POP / Miracle Moon(お月様が中継局) / Togo Project feat. Sana (Kelly) - 17 / HSEXY GIRLS / 淋しくてLoneliness / ワンダース (Meifa) - 21 / HAVANTGARDE / Bee's Eye / Waldeus von Dovjak (Edward) - 23 / HAFRIKA / con te sabi 2119 / J-Kane (Unbabo) - - / HCLASSIC / Chaos Age / J-Kane (Harmonov) - - / HJ-POP / Life / Haya-P Maru (Pretty) - - / HPOPS / I Really Want To Hurt You / Sugi Reo (Rie Chan) - - / HJ-TEKNO / Quick Master / Act Deft (Sholl Kee) - - / HDANCE / Hi-Tekno / Hi-Tekno (Judy) - - / HANIME HERO / 闘え！ギャンブラーＺ / Ryo NARAMCHA (Toru Kamikaze) - - / HSPY / Spicy piece / Original Sound Tracks (Charly) - - / HENKA / お江戸花吹雪 / 高田香里 (S.B. Taro) - - / HNEO ACO / (fly higher than) the stars / sugi reo (Sugi Kun) - - / HTECHNO '80 / Water Melon Woman / NAKATEK (Boy) - - / HURBAN POP / Prism Heart / Sana (Mrs. Wilson) - - / HCLASSIC 2 / R.C. / Waldeus von Dovjak / Classic 2 (Harmanov) - - / H Unlock InformationAs per usual, all songs can be unlocked based on time after the first 2 hours of gameplay. The fifth and final song, Prelude, takes 6 hours to unlock.To unlock Positive, select a male character and clear either Guitar Pop, Magical Girl, Kangtong, Rockabilly or Cute (N) as your first stage. Then, select a female character and clear Akiba as your first stage.To unlock Boys, select a male character and clear Akiba as your first stage. Then, clear Mondo, Jazzy, Groove Rock, Classic 3 (N), New Folk or Lounge as your second stage.To unlock Prelude, clear Avantgarde (N) with 85000 points or more as your first stage, then clear Classic 3 (N) with a score of 90000 or greater and a combo of 40 or greater.To unlock Jungle, get a combo of 100 or more on your first two stages.To unlock Lovely, clear Guitar Pop as your first stage with more than 80% greats, then play Lounge as your second stage. Unlock Codes You can temporarily unlock the above at the title screen. Played songs will not be saved. Here are the following button codes:LOVELY: 36866962686JUNGLE: 7637384122217POSITIVE: 1234667788911BOYS: 6868868868863PRELUDE: 123964871396487
